mapper.select: SELECT '330' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || LPAD(SQ_SVST_ITM_OSTR_IZ$ITM_OSTR_NO.NEXTVAL, 7, 0) AS OSTR_AK_NO , J1.WARE_NO FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ J1 INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ J2 ON (J2.BASE_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND J1.APY_YM = J2.BASE_YM AND J1.WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO = J2.PRTNR_NO AND J2.OG_TP_CD = 'W06' AND J2.CLTN_DT IS NULL AND J2.BZ_STAT_CD = '1' AND J1.WARE_USE_YN = 'Y' ) WHERE J1.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM')
